item.title: Anlon Healthcare IPO to list on Wednesday; GMP signals muted debut, price and other details here

review.headline_rewrite: Anlon Healthcare IPO to list on Wednesday; GMP signals muted debut, price and other details here
bullets: The initial public offering (IPO) of Anlon Healthcare, which closed recently, is scheduled to list on the Indian stock exchanges on Wednesday, September 3.
The IPO received total bids for 9.47 crore shares against 1.33 crore shares offered.
According to market sources, the company’s shares are quoting at ₹03 in the grey market, indicating that the shares might list slightly above the
The grey market premium reflects investors’ willingness to pay a premium over the IPO price.

item.title: IPO alert: Urban Company, boAt secure Sebi approval for listings

review.headline_rewrite: IPO alert: Urban Company, boAt secure Sebi approval for listings
bullets: Home services marketplace Urban Company and wearables brand boAt have received approval from the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) for their stock
The regulator’s clearance comes at a time when IPO activity is gaining momentum, with Sebi indicating a record number of approvals in the coming
Urban Company, which filed its draft red herring prospectus (DRHP) in April, plans to raise about ₹1,900 crore through its initial public offering (IPO).
According to its latest filings, Urban Company recorded a 38% year-on-year jump in revenue to ₹1,144 crore in FY25, while turning profitable with ₹28.5

item.title: TCS partners with Tryg on a €550 million deal for digital transformation over the next 7 years

review.headline_rewrite: TCS partners with Tryg on a €550 million deal for digital transformation over the next 7 years
bullets: The expanded partnership will create an opportunity for TCS to streamline a historically complex IT landscape shaped by organic growth and acquisitions, unify fragmented
TCS will also establish an operating model to manage business across three key markets that Tryg operates in.
